and operator = #{operator} and deviceId = #{deviceId} and processId = #{processId} and materialId = #{materialId} and code like CONCAT('%', #{code},'%') and supplierId = #{supplierId} and DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and isExamine = #{isExamine} and id not in (select process_report_id from mes_process_report_check) and DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and operatorName like CONCAT('%', #{operatorName},'%') and deviceName like CONCAT('%', #{deviceName},'%') and processName like CONCAT('%', #{processName},'%') and materialName like CONCAT('%', #{materialName},'%') and supplierName like CONCAT('%', #{supplierName},'%') and DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimes},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{yieldTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and deviceId is not null
